> [akito](#comment_119_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): Who gets access to these specific user IDs?

Maybe the developer of IFS and 0chan? 
But these IDs are randomly generated by these zites.

> [akito](#comment_120_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): But then how did this information got spread?

By peers seeding the hub. It is obvious.

> [akito](#comment_121_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): I mean that this hub got created in the first place... I don't check every zite search engine for "news" every day. That is obvious.

Ummm... Maybe he shouldnt use "spread"? The hub just provide a way for anonymous users talking on ZeroMe.

> [akito](#comment_122_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): I guess, you clearly don't understand what I am saying. I said something different than you respond to.

Do you mean that there should be someone to spread the hub for seeding?
Or you can tell me what you mean in a simpler way. >_<

> [akito](#comment_123_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): "A ZeroMe hub for Anonymous-users: Anonymous Hub.This hub accept and spread messages from users of @0ch.anonymous and @ifs.anonymous. :-)Thanks for your seeding and using! :D" [...]

He may be the creator of the hub. He spread this news to different "talks" in different languages.

> [akito](#comment_124_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): So who guarantees that these profiles who spread infos on this hub, are actually legit?

Maybe nobody.
But personally, I agree his try to let someone be more anonymous on ZeroMe if he want.

> [akito](#comment_125_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): Isn't this hub for Anonymous people?

Yes, it is.
Maybe I should ask. What is the meaning of "profiles r legit"?

> [akito](#comment_128_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): That the people posting are actually important Anonymous members..

I dont know... -_-
But it is a good news for someone who got a little Persecutory Delusion like me. :-)
